question: 12 Hour Time zone difference with USA affects the Indian BPO and KPO industry as follows:
option1: Its is advantageous for Indian BPO & KPO
option2: Its is disadvantageous for Indian BPO & KPO
option3: Its is neither disadvantageous nor advantageous for Indian BPO & KPO
option4: Either disadvantageous or advantageous for Indian BPO & KPO
answer: Its is advantageous for Indian BPO & KPO
explanation: 12 Hour Time zone difference with USA affects the Indian BPO and KPO industry . It is advantageous to Indian BPO and Kpo.
